cta.subtitle: Testimonials
cta.title: Take action now to stay compliant. Grow business without tension.
cta.paragraph: You can now reach beyond Creative to attract fans with shareable public previews of podcasts and video. You can also let fans join your community for free and get limited access to your public posts, with the opportunity to upgrade at any time.

hero.subtitle: Complete creative control
hero.title: Everything you need to make money doing what you love
hero.paragraph: Empower your creativity on a platform that values your work. With low fees, customizable pages, and direct engagement tools, we make monetizing your passion simple and rewarding. Join a community where every creator has a voice, and start building your success story today.

1.subtitle: Step 1: Create Your Account
1.title: Begin Your Creator Journey
1.paragraph: Embark on an exciting journey where your creative aspirations know no bounds and your unique content finds a welcoming audience. When you create an account with us, you're entering a diverse and inclusive platform designed for creators of all kinds. Our competitive 9% fee on tiers and pay-per-view offerings ensures that you get a more lucrative return on your hard work. With features like polls, Q&A sessions and private messaging on the horizon, you'll soon have even more ways to engage with your community and personalise your presence. Join our platform today where you can turn your passion into profit in an environment that celebrates creativity.

2.subtitle: Step 2: Customize Your Space
2.title: Make Your Space Yours
2.paragraph: Create a page that reflects your creativity! Use customization options such as changing your logo and background image to make your space unique. Take advantage of the ability to create unlimited tiers for diverse content offerings. With the upcoming addition of polls and Q&A sessions, you can engage with your audience on a deeper level, gathering insights and building stronger connections! Your webpage is not only a display of your work, but also a community waiting to be cultivated! Begin building your creative home today and get ready to enhance your connections with your audience like never before!

3.subtitle: Step 3: Share Your Work
3.title: Connect & Grow
3.paragraph: With your page prepared to impress, it's time to unleash your creativity and expand your audience! Share your images, text and videos with enthusiasm, knowing that each post is an opportunity to engage and inspire. The future introduction of private messages will open new avenues for direct communication with your patrons, making your community more vibrant and connected! Our platform provides a safe space for creators to grow! By using interactive features such as polls and Q&A, you can better engage with your audience and tailor your content to their preferences. Each interaction brings you closer to turning your passion into a sustainable career! Start sharing your work today and get ready to see your community and earnings flourish!

creators.subtitle: Complete creative control 3
creators.title: Everything you need to make money doing what you love
creators.paragraph: On Patreon, you can build a lasting business outside of the ad-based ecosystem, with revenue streamsranging from membership for offering ongoing benefits
